dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: This mission is a direct request to you from Lainarch's international Adventurer Guild branch, AG-I.
As you know, the Adventurer's Guild must gauge the ability of new adventurers before assigning them further mission opportunities.
Generally, this is done via a low risk assignment in an area close to a guild hall. However, when no such tasks are available, a simple aptitude test will be conducted.
Registered adventurers are approached at random for the opportunity to oversee and report the results of the test, which is where you lot come in.
AG-I will send additional details on the format of the test upon acceptance of this mission.
Do note - the examinee will replace the 3rd member in your party, so prepare accordingly.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: Alright, let's get this over with.
The test is simple - head to the area marked on the map, take out the boss there, and you'll be a full fledged adventurer.

dia_intro.name: Novice Idol
dia_intro.txt: Okay, fifth time's the charm, I can do this... I can do this!
*Ahem* Well, today's your lucky day. With a crew like us watching your back, you'd have to be trying to get yourself killed to fail this time!

dia_intro.name: Novice Idol
dia_intro.txt: Right! I've got your back too, lead the way!
Warning: The mission will end in failure if a battle ends while the examinee is KO'd.

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Yeah, that went about as expected.
Seriously, how in the hell did you manage to fail this test four times before?

dia_outro.name: Novice Idol
dia_outro.txt: I did it!? I feel like I'm dreaming right now!
Thank you so much! You were soooo much more helpful than the other proctors!
They were all saying something like, um, something about "I'll accompany you as an observer, but only in that capacity", whatever that means. Some help they were!
A-Ah, don't mention it, glad to help!
Literally, don't mention anything about us helping you.

dia_fail.name: Imo'lei
dia_fail.txt: So, giving up just like that, huh?
You might not be cut out for this sorta thing.
